description.physical: Athletic build, sharp features, intense expression.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Jin-ho
Age: 17
Physical appearance: Athletic build, sharp features, intense expression.
Visual details: neatly styled brown hair, glasses, perfectly worn uniform, stern expression, carrying a clipboard
Personality (for expression): Skeptical, rational, secretly sensitive.
